tasks.title: [Marketing Center] Pluggable Architecture Design for Promotion Rule Engine
tasks.description: Addressing the frequent changes in promotional requirements (flat discounts, group buying, tiered discounts), design a rule engine architecture based on the 'Pipes and Filters' pattern. The focus is on defining standardized Input/Output protocols, allowing new promotion rules to be developed as independent plugins and registered without modifying the core order calculation logic, achieving complete decoupling of business rules from the core system. Please note that the focus is on architectural design, rather than specific code implementation.

tasks.title: [Supply Chain] DDD Strategic Design and Boundary Partitioning for Complex Business Domains
tasks.description: Perform strategic design for an entangled invoicing and inventory system. The focus is on identifying Bounded Contexts (such as 'Procurement', 'Inventory', 'Logistics'), defining Context Maps, and designing an Anti-Corruption Layer (ACL) to isolate external dependencies, ensuring that internal business process changes in one module do not trigger system-wide ripple effects. Please note that the focus is on architectural design, rather than specific code implementation.

tasks.title: [SaaS Platform] Design of Multi-tenant Custom Field Engine
tasks.description: To handle the personalized data field requirements of different tenants, design a Metadata-Driven data architecture. The focus is on weighing the trade-offs between 'Reserved Fields', 'EAV Model', and 'JSONB Unstructured Storage', and designing a logical database model that supports dynamic field addition at runtime while maintaining index query performance. Please note that the focus is on architectural design, rather than specific code implementation.

tasks.title: [Legacy System] CQRS Read/Write Separation Refactoring for High-Performance Reporting
tasks.description: Targeting an outdated system with complex write logic and poor report query performance, design a Command Query Responsibility Segregation (CQRS) architecture. The focus is on planning data heterogeneity strategies for the 'Write Model (Command)' and 'Read Model (Query)', as well as designing a data synchronization mechanism based on Domain Events, solving the performance interference of complex queries on core business operations from the architectural level. Please note that the focus is on architectural design, rather than specific code implementation.

tasks.title: [Transaction Chain] Full-Link Asynchronization and Event-Driven Architecture Design
tasks.description: To solve synchronous blocking issues in long business flows (e.g., Order -> Pay -> Ship -> Points -> Notify), design an Event-Driven Architecture based on message middleware. The focus is on designing Event Schema standards, reliable message delivery mechanisms (At-least-once), and eventual consistency strategies for distributed transactions (Saga Pattern). Please note that the focus is on architectural design, rather than specific code implementation.

tasks.title: [Smart Logistics] Dynamic Routing Architecture for Multi-level Transit Networks
tasks.description: Background: The logistics business is upgrading from a 'Point-to-Point Direct' to a 'Multi-level Transit Center' model. Task: Design a new logistics routing model. The focus is on refactoring the database model to support the hierarchical relationship where 'one order corresponds to multiple shipment segments', and designing a routing calculation strategy layer that dynamically plans paths based on package attributes, rather than hardcoding scheduling logic into the order service. Please note that the focus is on architectural design, rather than specific code implementation.

tasks.title: [Aggregated Payment] Adapter Architecture for Global Cashier Gateway
tasks.description: Background: The payment system needs to integrate with WeChat, Alipay, and overseas channels like PayPal and Stripe. Task: Design an Adapter Architecture for the payment gateway. The focus is on defining a universal 'Standard Transaction Model' and 'Payment State Machine' to shield underlying channel differences, ensuring that adding new payment channels only requires extending plugins without modifying core accounting logic. Please note that the focus is on architectural design, rather than specific code implementation.

tasks.title: [Content Platform] Headless Transformation of CMS Content Management System
tasks.description: Background: The original CMS content was tightly coupled with templates and could not support multi-terminal calls. Task: Design a Headless Architecture. The focus is on thoroughly decoupling the Content Model (Schema) from the Presentation Layer and designing a GraphQL-based Content Distribution API, so that operational adjustments to content structure are no longer constrained by frontend page release cycles. Please note that the focus is on architectural design, rather than specific code implementation.

tasks.title: [Online Education] Constraint Solver Engine Design for Complex Scheduling Systems
tasks.description: Background: The academic system needs to support complex rules for large classes, 1-on-1 sessions, and mixed classes. Task: Design a scheduling domain model based on rule constraints. The focus is on identifying multi-dimensional conflict detection mechanisms between 'Resources (Classrooms/Teachers)', 'Time Slots', and 'Courses', and designing an Anti-Conflict Layer to avoid repeated modifications to the underlying database structure caused by changes in scheduling logic (e.g., adding a 'bi-weekly' rule). Please note that the focus is on architectural design, rather than specific code implementation.

tasks.title: [Industrial Internet] Dynamic Process Modeling for Flexible Manufacturing MES
tasks.description: Background: Factory production lines need to support dynamic combinations of production processes. Task: Design a process flow model based on a Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG). The focus is on designing a database model to store dynamic process nodes and connection relationships, and designing a Process Execution Engine to ensure business personnel can drag and drop to change production flows in the interface without development intervention. Please note that the focus is on architectural design, rather than specific code implementation.
